name: The Legendary Trumpet Cat
description:
Help Mr Whiskers play his trumpet to an audience of milk-tipsy cats, undead ghouls and the Mayoral royalty. Try and keep up in this guitar hero style rhythm game, and don't disappoint the judges!

Made as part of the 2022 October Buddy Jam over 2 weeks.

In collaboration with: 

Erimav - Programming - https://erimav.itch.io/

Vincent Guillelmon - Programming - https://playtotroll.itch.io/

Styxcolor - 2D Art - https://styxcolor.itch.io/

Steven Moreno - 3D Art - https://stevenxmoreno.itch.io/

Trumpetguy - Music, Sound - https://itch.io/profile/trumpetguy10

Bonne - Music
